attributes.additional_details:
Jobseekers are expected to seek employment seven
days a week 52 weeks a year,which is fine if it helps
reduce unemployment. But I think it would be better
for everyone if jobcentres were open 7 days a week
52 weeks a year 8am til 8pm.
So I am starting this petition for jobcentres to open
to suit jobseekers so there is always someone available 7 days a week all year round to help and
give advice whenever a jobseeker needs it this would
be a much fairer system for everyone.
